title: High-throughput design of complex oxides as isothermal, redox-activated CO2 sorbents for green hydrogen generation
content:
Energy Environ. Sci., 2024, 17,6279-6290
DOI: 10.1039/D4EE02119C, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 Unported Licence.
Runxia Cai, Kunran Yang, Xijun Wang, Mahe Rukh, Azin Saberi Bosari, Eric Giavedoni, Alexandra Pierce, Leo Brody, Wentao Tang, Phillip R. Westmoreland, Fanxing Li
A new family of Isothermal, redox-activated CO2 sorbents were successfully developed using a high-throughput combinatorial approach to facilitate the generation of green hydrogen from biogenic carbonaceous feedstocks.
